api_list.name: 1:1 Face Verification
api_list.description:
Both images should contains

- Single face
- Head-shot or CNIC
- Visible face
- Image size should be (100KB-1MB)


**CNIC Should be cropped**
![](https://www.incpak.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/NADRA.jpg)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tasdeeq-api.p.rapidapi.com/one-one"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tasdeeq-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: View Enrollment
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tasdeeq-api.p.rapidapi.com/all_enrolled"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tasdeeq-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Remove Enrolled Face

    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tasdeeq-api.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Face Enrollment
api_list.description:
For face enrollment, face image should be
1. Clear (Visible)
2. Head-shot or CNIC 
3. Size (100KB-1MB)


**CNIC Should be cropped**
![](https://www.incpak.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/NADRA.jpg)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tasdeeq-api.p.rapidapi.com/enroll"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tasdeeq-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
